title: Vital Record Certificates
text_content:
The
Virginia Vital Records Office
is responsible for maintaining and issuing certified copies of vital records (including birth, death, marriage, and divorce certificates) for events that occurred in Virginia.
Each state is responsible for maintaining vital records for events that occurred in that state. If you are looking for a birth or death record from another state, you must contact that state's Vital Records Office. A list of
contact information for other states
is provided for your convenience.
